name.japanese: ポートガス・D・エース

keyMoments.title: Ace Searches for Luffy in Nanohana
keyMoments.description: Ace is shown actively searching for Luffy in Nanohana, asking townspeople if they've seen him while showing Luffy's wanted poster.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Ace's presence in Arabasta and his mission to find his younger brother.

keyMoments.title: Ace's Narcolepsy Displayed at Spice Bean
keyMoments.description: Ace falls asleep face-first into his food at the Spice Bean restaurant, causing onlookers to think he died. He wakes up and apologizes casually.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Ace's signature character trait of sudden narcolepsy, which becomes a recurring comedic element.
keyMoments.quote: Sorry about that. I fell asleep.

keyMoments.title: Revealed as Luffy's Older Brother
keyMoments.description: Ace reveals to Smoker and the Straw Hat crew that he is Luffy's older brother, explaining that a big brother must look out for his little brother.
keyMoments.significance: Major character relationship reveal that adds depth to both Ace and Luffy's backstories and sets up future emotional story arcs.
keyMoments.quote: A big brother has to look out for his little brother.

keyMoments.title: Identified as Whitebeard's Second Division Commander
keyMoments.description: Smoker recognizes and identifies Ace as Portgas D. Ace, the Second Division Commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Ace's position in the pirate world hierarchy and reveals his connection to one of the most powerful pirate crews.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Mera Mera no Mi Powers
keyMoments.description: Ace tells Luffy that he ate the Mera Mera no Mi Devil Fruit, granting him the power to create, control, and become fire.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the most iconic Logia-type Devil Fruits and establishes Ace as a powerful Devil Fruit user.
keyMoments.quote: I ate the Mera Mera no Mi. I'm a fire man now.

keyMoments.title: Uses Kagero to Block Smoker
keyMoments.description: Ace demonstrates his Kagero technique, shooting a stream of fire from his palm to neutralize Smoker's White Blow attack.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Ace's combat abilities and the Mera Mera no Mi's power in action.

bounties.reason: Second Division Commander of Whitebeard Pirates

abilities.description: Ace shoots a stream of fire from his palm, capable of neutralizing smoke-based attacks and creating a defensive barrier.

relationships.description: Ace is Luffy's older brother (sworn brother, not biological). They share a deep bond and Ace is protective of Luffy.

evolutionMoments.description: Ace is revealed to be Luffy's older brother and protects him from Smoker.

relationships.description: Ace confronts Smoker to protect Luffy, creating tension between the pirate commander and the Marine captain.

evolutionMoments.description: Ace blocks Smoker's attack with his fire powers, preventing him from capturing Luffy.

reveals.information: Revealed to be Luffy's older brother
Second Division Commander of the Whitebeard Pirates
User of the Mera Mera no Mi Devil Fruit
Suffers from narcolepsy, falling asleep suddenly

keyMoments.title: Crashes into Spice Bean
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses Gomu Gomu no Rocket to launch himself into Spice Bean restaurant, accidentally hitting both Ace and Smoker.
keyMoments.significance: Luffy's recklessness inadvertently brings together three important characters.

keyMoments.title: Confirms Ace as His Brother
keyMoments.description: Luffy confirms to his shocked crew that Ace is his older brother.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals to the Straw Hats that Luffy has a powerful older brother in the pirate world.

relationships.description: Luffy's older brother who is protective of him.

evolutionMoments.description: Ace is revealed to be Luffy's older brother.

reveals.information: Has an older brother named Portgas D. Ace

keyMoments.title: Arrives in Nanohana
keyMoments.description: Smoker makes his presence known in Nanohana, carrying captured pirates and continuing his pursuit of the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Re-establishes Smoker as a persistent threat in the Arabasta Arc.

keyMoments.title: Identifies Ace as Whitebeard Commander
keyMoments.description: Smoker recognizes and identifies Ace as the Second Division Commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Smoker's knowledge of the pirate world hierarchy.
keyMoments.quote: Portgas D. Ace... Second Division Commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Attack Blocked by Ace
keyMoments.description: Smoker's White Blow attack is neutralized by Ace's Kagero fire technique, preventing him from capturing Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Smoker's powers have limitations against stronger Logia-type Devil Fruit users.

relationships.description: Confronted by Ace when attempting to capture Luffy.

evolutionMoments.description: Ace blocks Smoker's attack to protect Luffy.

keyMoments.title: Encounters Zoro in Nanohana
keyMoments.description: Tashigi is seen in Nanohana criticizing a sword merchant's prices. Zoro spots her and quickly hides to avoid confrontation.
keyMoments.significance: Continues the ongoing tension between Zoro and Tashigi.

keyMoments.title: Arrives Too Late to the Confrontation
keyMoments.description: Tashigi runs to the wrong part of Nanohana and misses the entire confrontation between Smoker, Ace, and the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Provides comedic relief and shows Tashigi's lack of situational awareness.

keyMoments.title: Serves Luffy at Spice Bean
keyMoments.description: Yoshimoto, the owner of Spice Bean restaurant, serves Luffy despite the chaos caused by him crashing through the walls.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the restaurant owner who maintains his composure during the chaotic events.
